00037 // nifti header based on code sample from
00038 //
00039 //   http://nifti.nimh.nih.gov/pub/dist/src/niftilib/nifti1.h
00040 
00041 typedef struct  {
00042         int   m_cySizeHeader; // MUST be 348
00043         char  m_vchUnused[36]; 
00044 
00045         short m_vcSize[8]; // Data array dimensions
00046         float m_vrIntent[3]; // intent parameters
00047 
00048         short m_nCodeIntent; // NIFTI_INTENT_* code
00049         short m_nCodeData; // NIFTI_TYPE_* code
00050         short m_cBitsPerPixel;  
00051         short m_nSliceStart; // First slice index.
00052         float m_vrScale[8]; // Grid spacings.
00053         float m_nyDataStart; // Offset into .nii file
00054         float m_rDataScale; // Data scaling: slope.
00055         float m_drDataOffset; // Data scaling: offset.
00056         short m_nyDataEnd; // Last slice index.
00057         char m_nCodeSlice; // NIFTI_SLICE_* code
00058 
00059         char  m_nCodeUnits; // NIFTI_UNITS_* code
00060         float m_rDataMax; // Max display intensity
00061         float m_rDataMin; // Min display intensity
00062         float m_dtmSlice; // Time for slice.
00063         float m_dtmOffset; // Time axis shift.
00064 
00065         char m_vchUnused2[8];
00066 
00067         char  m_vchDescription[80]; 
00068         char  m_sflAux[24]; // auxiliary filename.
00069 
00070         short m_nCodeQForm; // NIFTI_XFORM_* code.
00071         short m_nCodeSForm; // NIFTI_XFORM_* code.
00072 
00073         float m_vrQuaternion[6]; // Quaternion parameters
00074 
00075         float m_vrAffine[12]; // affine transform
00076 
00077         char m_vsIntentName[16];
00078 
00079         char m_vchMagic[4]; // MUST be "ni1\0" or "n+1\0".
00080 } NiftiHeader;
